title: BIODEGRADABLE TOP MEMBRANE FOR A BEVERAGE CAPSULE
fig_desc: These terms should be understood to refer to the capsule in its normal orientation when positioned in the beverage preparation machine for the production of a beverage as shown in the figures 1, 2, 3A, 3B
all_fig_descs: These terms should be understood to refer to the capsule in its normal orientation when positioned in the beverage preparation machine for the production of a beverage as shown in the figures 1, 2, 3A, 3B
